name: Kisha
abilityDescription: +1 Reroll for every equipped non-Magic Ranged attack card.

name: Jaimie
abilityDescription: May exhaust her Hero card to Move a Close Character up to 2 spaces away (this Move doesn't trigger Guard Reaction).

name: Diana
abilityDescription: When attacking a Clost Enemy with a Bow or Thrown Weapon, may target one extra Close enemy per crit rolled.

name: Cassius
abilityDescription: When attacking with a Lance or Exotic attack card, the target does not roll Defense dice.

name: Mark
abilityDescription: When attacking, does not exhaust a non-Magic Melee attack card while Close to an Ally.

name: Phyx
abilityDescription: When attacking with a Sword attack card, each crit deals one additional Hit.

name: Jack-Jack
abilityDescription: If his attack rolls any Hits, you may switch one of the target's Upgrade cards with another from their Guild (before rolling Defense).

name: Izzy
abilityDescription: When he kills a Monster, place its figure on Hero card. He may use it like a Healing or Refreshing Potion (returning it to the box).

name: Sybbyl
abilityDescription: When using a Magic attack, she may take 1 Death Curse to roll +1 die (keep the Death Curse card with the highest value).

name: Natasha
abilityDescription: When attacking a flanked target (a target with a least one different Enemy Close to it) the attack deals 1 extra Wound.

name: Trandir
abilityDescription: When using a Magic attack, may exhaust his Hero card to target an additional Enemy Close to the target.
